platform.description: The Research, Development, and Innovation (IDI) Platform is a versatile tool that supports scientific research, project development, and technological innovation. With features such as project formulation, task management, creation of scientific articles, and measurement of technological maturity, IDI offers an efficient and collaborative workflow for researchers and scientists, enhancing productivity and success in their projects.

code.label: User identification code
code.hint: This is a code provided by the platform.
code.error: There is an error with the code.

name.label: Full name(s)
name.tooltip: Enter the user's first name(s) here, without including the last name.
name.hint: Enter the user's first name(s) without including the last name.

lastName.label: Full last name(s)
lastName.tooltip: Enter the user's last name(s) here, without including the first name.
lastName.hint: Enter the user's last name(s) without including the first name.

gender.label: Biological Gender
gender.tooltip: Select your biological gender or the gender identity you currently identify with.
gender.hint: The available options are 'Male' and 'Female' as this field is based on the biological gender a person was born with or currently identifies with sexually.

birthday.label: Date of birth
birthday.tooltip: Please enter your date of birth.
birthday.hint: Enter your date of birth in the format YYYY/MM/DD. You must be at least 10 years old to register on the platform.
birthday.error: Enter a valid date of birth.

email.label: Email
email.tooltip: Please enter a valid email address. The email must be in the list of valid emails.
email.hint: Make sure to enter a valid email address. Generally, these are institutional emails.

password.label: Password
password.tooltip: Enter a strong password with a minimum of 8 characters.
password.hint: Enter a password with a minimum of 8 characters.
password.error: The password is invalid or too weak.

confirm.label: Confirm password
confirm.tooltip: Make sure the password matches exactly.
confirm.hint: Confirm the password to avoid security issues.

confirmed.label: Confirmed on...
confirmed.hint: Date and time of user confirmation.

created.label: Created on...
created.hint: Date and time of user creation.

updated.label: Updated on...
updated.hint: Date and time of the last update to user information.

deleted.label: Deactivated on...
deleted.hint: Date and time of user deactivation. If it is not in the agreed format, it means the user is active.

code.label: Institution identification code

name.label: Institution name
name.tooltip: Enter the institution's name without its business type.

link.label: Platform link
link.tooltip: Enter the link to the institution's platform, on the homepage.
link.hint: Enter the link to the institution's platform.

type.label: Institution type
type.tooltip: Enter the institution's type, for example: University, Association, Foundation, etc.

created.label: Created on...
created.hint: Date and time of institution creation.

updated.label: Updated on...
updated.hint: Date and time of the last update to institution information.

deleted.label: Deactivated on...
deleted.hint: Date and time of institution deactivation. If it is not in the agreed format, it means the institution is active.
